Class OrderServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.cafe.backend.service.impl.OrderServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrderService
@Service public class OrderServiceImpl extends Object implements OrderService
OrderServiceImpl is the service-layer implementation of the OrderService interface.

It handles business logic for creating, updating, retrieving, and filtering orders. The service interacts with multiple repositories to persist and retrieve data related to orders, users, products, and cafeterias.

It uses OrderMapper to convert between OrderEntity and OrderDTO, and supports logical deletion as well as order status updates.
